title: Summer Monteys-Fullam insists she wasn't with Paul Hollywood for his bank balance
text:

Summer Monteys-Fullam has hit back at cruel jibes suggesting she was only with Paul Hollywood for his money.

The 24-year-old barmaid enjoyed a two year romance with the 30-years-older Bake Off judge that came to a grinding halt in August.

It was reported that Paul had wanted Summer to sign a non-disclosure agreement and her refusal to comply was the final nail in the coffin for their age gap love.

Since then Summer has been - in her own words - 'taking every opportunity she can' to further a career in the showbiz spotlight.

But she's adamant her intentions for dating 53-year-old Paul, who takes home a six figure salary for Bake Off alone, was not his money or fame.

(Image: summermonteysfullam/Instagram)

"I don't want the world to think I was only after someone for their money," Summer tells New! magazine.

"I worked very hard for the car I drive, the clothes I wear, the shoes I own, my phone - right down to my lip liner. I worked for all of it. Even off the back of being in a very public relationship, with someone who is very fortunate in their bank balance or their profile, people forget that. You can love someone for them not their assets," she insists.

Self-sufficient Summer says she has her 'fingers in a lot of pies' and lists horse whisperer and laser practitioner on her varied CV.

(Image: Dan Wooller/REX)

The redhead is now hoping to venture into acting and has been spotted networking at celeb parties in the hope of widening in her circle.

And it seems her hard work is paying off.

She admits: "I've been offered several opportunities in the film and TV industry and it's crazy because I never thought I'd go down this path.

"A lot of doors have opened and I'm just taking every opportunity as it comes. I'd love to do something like Game of Thrones or Vikings, mainly so I could work with horses."

Summer had also been linked to I'm A Celebrity but shot down the rumours last month saying producers hadn't even approached her.
description: The 24-year-old ex barmaid said she looks only to herself for support
